explains: n. 注册；登记处；挂号处；船舶的国籍
wordGroup: companies registry 公司注册处；公司登记
registry office 登记处（等于register office）
registry key 登录机码；注册码；注册键

sentences.en: To edit it, you need to run the built-in Windows Registry editor.
sentences.cn: 要编辑，就需要启动内置的视窗注册编辑程序。

sentences.en: Even if there isn't a registry, a good housewarming gift is something to decorate the new house with, like a piece of art or a plant.
sentences.cn: 即使没有登记，一个好的乔迁礼物如一件艺术品或一株植物也可以用来装饰新房。

sentences.en: There is no international registry of stolen art.
sentences.cn: 没有一个国际性的被盗艺术品记录保管处。
